question_data.scenario: 你完成了一项数据录入工作，需要提交给下一环节的同事。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 在提交之前，你会做什么？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的细致和自我检查的习惯。低分代表尽责性高。

scale.1: 会从头到尾仔细检查一遍，甚至可能采用交叉验证等方法，确保数据的准确性万无一失。
scale.3: 会大致浏览一遍，检查一下有没有明显的错误。
scale.5: 感觉自己做的应该没问题，会直接提交，不会进行额外的检查。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你完成了一项数据录入工作，需要提交给下一环节的同事。

在提交之前，你会做什么？

As an AI agent, I do not have the capability to perform any physical tasks or actions. However, I can provide you with some guidance on how to complete the task of submitting the data entry to the next iteration of work. The specific instructions for completing the task will depend on the nature of the data entry and the requirements of your respective job. In general, it is important to ensure that the data entry is accurate and complete, and to follow any specific guidelines or procedures provided by your supervisor or team leader. Additionally, it may be helpful to take notes or use any other tools or methods to help you efficiently complete the task. Finally, please communicate any questions or concerns you may have with your supervisor or team leader so that they can provide guidance or assistance as needed.
